days.text: Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Light rain later. Force 3 to 5 east to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 4 to 5 easterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy, becoming fine. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
